about_the_game:
Save the world with color and music again! Music game!



There was a world where only URO lived.
I brought music and color back to the world
Again, one day, colors and sounds disappeared from the world.
The UROs who noticed the incident
To bring music and color back to the world
I started running again with my own music.
 

More than 100 songs can be played! !

SF chic world view and beautiful 3D graphics,
And enjoy with various kinds of various sounds that you will hear.
Enjoy 4 types of game modes from beginners to core users
Finished in game balance.

 

Even music game beginners can easily and have fun!

・ Operation is DFJK and space key!

・ Retry can be done quickly.

・ When you get tired, take a break! Auto save function for each stage!

-There is also a game mode with fewer buttons for beginners!

【This Game in Music】

detailed_description:
Save the world with color and music again! Music game!



There was a world where only URO lived.
I brought music and color back to the world
Again, one day, colors and sounds disappeared from the world.
The UROs who noticed the incident
To bring music and color back to the world
I started running again with my own music.
 

More than 100 songs can be played! !

SF chic world view and beautiful 3D graphics,
And enjoy with various kinds of various sounds that you will hear.
Enjoy 4 types of game modes from beginners to core users
Finished in game balance.

 

Even music game beginners can easily and have fun!

・ Operation is DFJK and space key!

・ Retry can be done quickly.

・ When you get tired, take a break! Auto save function for each stage!

-There is also a game mode with fewer buttons for beginners!

name: URO2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3230M or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 720M or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
